description.content: In this challenge, you'll build an FAQ accordion. This is an extremely common front-end pattern, so it's an excellent opportunity to get some practice in!
Your users should be able to:

content: Hide/Show the answer to a question when the question is clicked
Navigate the questions and hide/show answers using keyboard navigation alone
View the optimal layout for the interface depending on their device's screen size
See hover and focus states for all interactive elements on the page

testCases.content: Test your solution with these cases:

content: Clicking a question should show its answer; clicking again should hide it.
Opening a new answer should close the previous one.
